TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.param: Oggetto che contiene i dati dell'evento.
Docs.summary: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà gli eventi e del controllo .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> classe definisce un delegato del gestore per due eventi che si verificano nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo: il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento. Il metodo che gestisce il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> metodo. Il metodo che gestisce il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> metodo. In entrambi i casi, i dati dell'evento sono contenuti un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> oggetto.
